title: Dragon Master Swain Chromas?

embed.description: Greetings, Summoners, Welcome to patch 8.8! As we move towards the middle of the season, the next few months will be jam-packed with a bunch of events (MSI, the launch of Clash, and start of the summer split to name a few).

body:
Looking forward to the new patch, but where are the already teased **Swain chromas**? New Rumble Skin will get his chromas now. but Swain not? pretty frustrating since i waited every day for their release. :(

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Aktvhroco0U
